statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 24 \\ -7 \\ 19 \\ 7 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -59 \\ 34 \\ -65 \\ -22 \\ -23 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -59 \\ 29 \\ -60 \\ -17 \\ -43 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
